file_content.text: [This datapad is too damaged to play Evoc-Ra's message again.]
[This datapad has very little power left. It appears to belong to the dead Voss commando.]
Evoc-Ra... of the commandos. Came to escort scholars... they were gone.
Gormak clever... took scholars prisoner. Left clear trail.
A trap, of course. Squad dead, scholars still in danger....
[There are coordinates on the datapad leading to a cave nearby. If the scholars are being held there, freeing them may impress the Voss.]
[You download the coordinates from Evoc-Ra's datapad. The datapad immediately shuts down.]
[The datapad's screen flickers and dies. It cannot be used at this time.]
